body.name: FD Wireless Mouse V8 2.4G Fashion Power Ultrathin Silent Wireless Mouse with Nano Receiver 1500 DPI Precise Control for Notebook Computer PC Laptop MacBook (Gradient Yellow to Red)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Power Saving Design: The wireless optical mouse will be in sleep mode after 5 minutes without operation. Simply click the left or right button to wake it up when you want it to work again, eliminating the need for an on/off switch and the need to change batteries. It is powered by 1 AA battery (not included).

Cordless Mouse: The 2.4GHz wireless technology provides a reliable connection with a long working distance of up to 20m and a 250Hz super high-speed rate of return, which eliminates delays, dropouts, and interference.

Ergonomic Mouse: The GXUV surface treatment technology and comfortable cherry wheel provide all-day comfort for work and entertainment, with a quiet click and slim portable size, making it perfect for travel.

USB Connection: A USB nano receiver, which is stored in the back of the mouse, conveniently slots into your computer's USB port. The mouse is plug-and-play and is compatible with almost all USB-enabled computers and laptops. (Note: This mouse will not be compatible with MacBook Pro or other devices that only have Type C ports. An adapter will be required for it to work.)

Service for You: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee and a 36-month warranty. If you have any questions about our product, please do not hesitate to contact us for after-sales service. We will respond within 24 hours.Note: This mouse will not be compatible with MacBook Pro or other devices that only have Type C ports. An adapter will be required for it to work.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 10,983 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At FD Tech, our goal is to provide wireless mouse and keyboard products that are both stylish and easy to use. The V8 wireless mouse is designed with a sleek and modern aesthetic, perfect for young people and kids who appreciate a youthful design. The ergonomic shape and comfortable rubber scroll wheel make it a comfortable choice for extended use. The cherry soft wheel design ensures a comfortable fit for your fingers, while the ultra-quiet mouse offers maximum quiet when clicking the left or right button. With a 90% reduced click sound, you can enjoy the sound of silence. The V8 wireless mouse is available in a variety of colors, including black, green, red, rose, gradient yellow to red, gradient orange to mint green, and white. All of these colors embody the ideal of pursuing a simple and sunny life. We hope that our products will inspire you to live with a youthful heart, wherever you are and whatever you do. The V8 wireless mouse is compatible with a wide range of devices, including notebooks, computers, PCs, laptops, Macbooks, Chromebooks, and more. It is system-agnostic, making it a great choice for home, office, or classroom use. We are confident that our wireless mouse will meet your needs and make you stand out with its elegant and slim appearance.

Our wireless mouse utilizes advanced 2.4GHz wireless technology, allowing for a more reliable connection, stronger anti-interference ability, faster transmission speed, and a larger working range. With a range of up to 20 meters in 360 degrees, you can work without any interference and enjoy fast data transmission without delays or dropouts. In addition, the 1500 DPI precise control and 250 return rates ensure that the mouse is responsive and accurate, meeting most of your needs whether you're using it at home or in the office. Note: *The operation distance may vary depending on the environment. Our wireless mouse features a smart power-saving design that automatically puts it into sleep mode after about 5 minutes of being idle. There's no need for an on/off switch, simply click on the right or left button to wake it up. With a battery standby life of up to 36 months, you can use it without worrying about battery replacement or even forgetting to change the battery. Note: Battery life may vary depending on the user and PC conditions. (Battery not included) ** This mouse has no light (to protect our eyes) and on/off switch. Simply click any button to wake it up. Package includes: 1 Wireless Mouse 1 Nano Receiver 1 User Manual Universal Compatibility: Our wireless mouse is compatible with a variety of devices, including Windows 2000/ME/XP (*64)/Vista/7/8/10, Mac OS X (V10.4 and above), Chrome OS, and Linux Kernel (2.6 and above). It works with notebooks, computers, PCs, laptops, Macbooks, Chromebooks, and more.

Our slim wireless mouse features a scientific ergonomic design with the right and left buttons and a clickable scroll wheel, as well as a hand-fitted shape that effectively reduces wrist and arm fatigue even after extended use.Made of smooth and comfortable ABS plastic, this series of wireless mice is characterized by its glossy, colorfast material and fresh colors that can brighten up your computer and desktop, helping to keep you in a good mood.Its pocket-ready and extra-thin design make it perfect for travel, as it can easily fit into your laptop bag or pocket.With its smooth rolling capabilities and accurate tracking on most surfaces, there's no need for a pad, ensuring a hassle-free user experience.

How to use: 1. Open the battery case and insert the battery (pay attention to the positive and negative positions，Battery not included). 2. Attach the battery case cover and insert the nano receiver into your computer's USB interface. 3. Wait for a minute for the device to install automatically, and you can start using it immediately. Our wireless mouse is designed to be plug-and-play, with no drivers needed. When you insert the nano receiver into the USB port of your device, it will install automatically, allowing you to enjoy wireless freedom without delay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A surprisingly great product for a surprisingly low price.
reviews.reviewText: Samsung Chromebook Plus User-TLDR: I absolutely love this. I wasn't expecting much, seeing as it's only 10.99, but I am pleasantly surprised. I was worried that it wouldn't play nice with Chrome OS, but as soon as I plugged the USB in, it immediately started working.ACCURACY- Great! It responds very well and is neither too fast or too slow, and I didn't even have to adjust anything in my settings.NOISE- Great! The click sound is very muffled, which I think I'll find useful when my partner is asleep and I need to do work. If you prefer a more mechanical feel, however, this mouse is not for you.FEEL- This mouse fits my hand very well, even though it's not one of those fancy ergonomic mice. The scroller is more "clicky" than smooth.LOOK- It looks great. The white is as white as shown in pictures. It's very simple with no buttons on the side, and I like that.General things I like about it:-The USB fits inside the mouse itself, which is amazing to have compared to other mice that fit theirs in on the bottom. The USB feels more protected this way when it's not in my Chromebook.-IT CAME WITH A BATTERY!!! Gone is the pain of reciving an item and it not having the battery included. The battery was even wrapped so it wasn't wasting power while sitting on the shelf and being shipped.-The packaging was simple and compact. Not nearly as much wasted space as many other items on amazon.Overall, I give this a 5/5! A surprisingly great product for a surprisingly low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So quiet, I'm getting another one!
reviews.reviewText: This mouse isn't like those tiny travel mice that give you cramps in your hand. I had this mouse since September and I was using it every day for school, it's super quiet! I used it at home sometimes if I was feeling lazy instead of using my wired one, so I can say it even works well for gaming and 3D modeling. The battery lasts a really long time, I think I only changed it once or twice within the time I had it. Unfortunately, while backpack, my laptop smashed the scroll wheel into the mouse and I can't get it back out. I'm getting another one now and thought I'd write a review while I'm here! I like that it is low profile because it doesn't jut out in my backpack, it fits very nicely into a pocket. Oh, and it has worked well on every surface I've tried it on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love color and use it as an extra mouse when I travel with my laptop. Good quality would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is the cutest thing. It matches a laptop bag I just purchased off Amazon. It's nice to use and comfortable in my hand. However, I had NO IDEA until I did this review that it had sleep mode. Now I'm wondering how do you activate that. Sometimes it does wiggle on my screen a little even when sitting totally still. It may be because it needs to be on a totally flat surface. I do use my laptop when I'm in the bed, so maybe that's it. But overall it works well. I would have liked to see an off button BUT it's still great! I got a black & gold one for my daughter and she loves it too!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 years later - still works great
reviews.reviewText: I use this mouse at work. It's non stop for 8-9 hours 5 times a week - it works today as it did when I bought it in 2020. That's the longest I have used a wireless mouse - it's amazing I didn't need replacement yet. Def worth every penny.Just a note about the colors - it may be slightly different than what you see on photos. Different shade of a color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Mouse and Great Price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was looking for something sleek, chic, simple and affordable. You get all of that with this mouse and it feels great, non slip too! You honestly can’t go bad with this product.I use it on my HP computer and works great. I decided to wait a month of use to write a review, I am not disappointed! It comes with a small USB to connect on your computer port, it’s so small that u chat notice it. Sometimes I forget it’s plugged in. Lastly, it’s a good size, I was a bit sketch because i did not want a small mouse, where my hand would completely cover it and it would look weird. I did not have that problem with this mouse, both my boyfriend and I use it and no complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fixed the problem of a glitchy laptop mouse
reviews.reviewText: A very old laptop was having issues with the mouse function. I got this guy in an effort to stretch out the usability of the laptop until the "back to school" deals start up and I can replace it. It worked! The wireless mouse moves like butter, so smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install

reviews.reviewText: Hier stimmt alles: Design, Performance, Preis-Leistungsverhältnis! Einzige Marotte: Nach dem Starten des PCs/Macs ist die Maus nicht sofort eindatzbereit, sondern muss kurz angetippt werden, um zu "erwachen". Wer damit leben kann, wird mit dieser Maus viel Freude haben.
Muy práctico y manejable. Además es muy bonito. Mi hija está encantada.

Sono soddisfatta dell acquisto!mouse senza fili comodissimo,veloce,leggero,maneggevole,perfetto!si chiude solo dopo un po' che non si usa!e riprende a funzionare quando si muove!anche mio marito né vuole uno!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 3, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Works no problem, can use the mouse on most surfaces. Easy to set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 25, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly with chromebook, silent operation and comfortable grip, an excellent product for a good price.
